sourcesContent:
import { Button, Card, Grid, Icon, Paper, TextField } from '@material-ui/core';
import React, { Component } from 'react';

class AddProduct extends Component {
    render() {

        return (
            <>
            <Grid container>
                <Grid item sm={6}>
                        <Paper>
                            <Card>
                                <form>
                                    <label>Full Name</label>
                                    <TextField
                                        required id="standard-required" label="Required"
                                    />
                                    <label>SKU</label>
                                    <TextField
                                        required id="standard-required" label="Required"
                                    />
                                    <label>Price</label>
                                    <TextField
                                        required id="standard-required" label="Required"
                                    />
                                    <Button
                                        type="submit"
                                        variant="outlined"
                                        color="secondary"
                                        endIcon={<Icon>save</Icon>}
                                    >Save Product</Button>
                                </form>

                            </Card>
                        </Paper>
F
                </Grid>
                <Grid item sm={6}></Grid>
            </Grid>
             
            </>
        );
    }
}

export default AddProduct;
